mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT DEP_NM FROM WDM.AX_A_PRECORD WHERE DEP_NM IS NOT NULL ORDER BY DEP_NM

Select DISTINCT Regexp_Substr(SKILL_NAME,'[^,]+', 1, Level) as skill_name From WDM.AX_A_PRECORD WHERE SKILL_NAME IS NOT NULL Connect By Regexp_Substr(SKILL_NAME, '[^,]+', 1, Level) Is Not Null ORDER BY skill_name
mapper.update: MERGE INTO WDM.AX_A_PRECORD USING DUAL ON (AGENT_ID = #{agent_id}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET dep_nm = #{dep_nm}, join_date = #{join_date}, work_time = #{work_time}, work = #{work}, skill_name = #{skill_name}, age = #{age}, mey_yn = #{mey_yn}, gender = #{gender}, work_yn = #{work_yn}, leave_date = #{leave_date} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (agent_id, dep_nm, join_date, work_time, work, skill_name, age, mey_yn, gender, work_yn, leave_date) VALUES (#{agent_id}, #{dep_nm}, #{join_date}, #{work_time}, #{work}, #{skill_name}, #{age}, #{mey_yn}, #{gender}, #{work_yn}, #{leave_date} )
